content: this is a **free pattern** of little ghostie simple and easy to crochet it s a **no-sew pattern** i hope you enjoy making him language english **size ** if you use yarn as me the finish doll will be 12 5cm / 4 9inch tall including hat **materials and tools required ** - yarn yarnart jeans 50g 160m or any sport weight yarn you can use any yarn you want just remember to adjust the size of the hook - crochet hook size 2-2 5 mm - yarn needle - black embroidery thread - safety eyes 6 00 mm - stuffing - stitch marker basic crochet skills required the magic_ring the ultimate finish chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet increase decrease back loop only front loops only and how to change color should you have any questions regarding this crochet pattern or need assistance please feel free to contact us via the following channels - direct message - instagram demiwool if you are unable to find the files kindly contact demiwool via direct message providing your email address *this pattern is for personal use only please do not copy re-selling share translate or distribute all or part of this pattern you may sell finished products from this pattern provided using the hashtag #demiwool to credit us as designer *
